cause.description:
To end the threat of terror bears (bears that terrorize society via acts of violence)
1. Nuclear Arms Deals to Bears Must Be Halted
2. To Integrate Bears As Domestic Pets that can Save Lives, Guard Houses, and Help The Blind
3. Terror Bears (see description) Terminated
4. United States Bear Party Terminated
5. Anthrax Deals To Bear Third Parties In the United States Stopped (Anthrax Is In Fact Dealt To Bears In Large Quantities)
6. Money Trails To Bears Eliminated
7. Arm Squirrells To Help Combat Bear Insurgency in the Forrest
8. Suicide Bear Attacks Stopped
9. Bear Training Camps Destroyed
10. Governmental Genetic Engineering Of Sharks To Defend Western Coast From Seaborne Nuclear Weapon Attacks Of Terrorism
11. Terminate France and Populants
cause.mission: Assimilate bears into society thus ending their hostile nature through domestication
cause.name: Prevention Of Global Takeover by Bears
